name: Marvellous Agency
description: We’re a small, dynamic digital agency based in Leeds, UK, specialising in eCommerce, web design and development, as well as strategy, branding, illustration and copy. We’ve delivered hundreds of successful projects over the last 12 years for many businesses, brands, and non-profits, working mainly on WordPress (often using WooCommerce) and Magento, with experience in providing long-term, bespoke digital transformations.
